```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(hakaisalmon)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggridges)
```

```{r}
L_adams <- survey_seines_fish_stock_id %>% 
  filter(stock_1 %in% c("L_Adams", "MiddleShuswap", "L_Shuswap", "Little")) %>% 
  select(survey_date, fork_length, stock_1, site_id, region) %>% 
  arrange(fork_length)

write_csv(L_adams, "~/L_adams.csv")

ggplot(L_adams, aes(x = fork_length, fill = stock_1)) +
           geom_histogram()

L_adams
```
